hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { read cmd; if echo "$cmd" | grep -qiE 'rm\s+-rf\s+(hr|reviews|compensation|onboarding|hiring)/'; then echo '[proagent-hr] Destructive operation on HR documents detected. Verify this is intentional.' >&2; exit 2; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read fp; if echo "$fp" | grep -qiE '(job-description|hiring|onboarding|review|compensation).*\.md$'; then echo '[proagent-hr] HR document written. Verify inclusive language, required sections, and no PII exposure.'; fi; }
